 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺרֶג‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Isa.41.15|Isa 41:15]]</sup> ==threshing-sledge== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] ***id.***, South Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>133</sup>, compare [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>ZA ii.117</sup> (loan-word in Arabic = ***ploughshare***); modern <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Dozy|Dozy]]<sup>ii. 623, and</sup> <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Wetzst|Wetzst]]<sup>Z.für Ethnol. 1873, 270 ff.</sup>, Anderlind<sup>ZPV ix. 41 f.</sup> (***ploughshare*** and ***harrow***,)); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[Isa.41.15|Isa 41:15]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֹרִגִּים‎</span> [[2Sam.24.22|2Sam 24:22]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּלֵי הַבָּקָר‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺרִגִּים‎</span> [[1Chr.21.23|1Chr 21:23]] — ***threshing-sledges*** of Araunah, given by him to David for wood of sacrifice [[2Sam.24.22|2Sam 24:22]] = [[1Chr.21.23|1Chr 21:23]] figurative of Israel as instrument of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s judgment [[Isa.41.15|Isa 41:15]]. On form of threshing-sledge (modern; slightly turned up in front, and set with sharp stones or pieces of iron), and threshing-rollers, see [[BDB#Benz|Benz]]<sup>Archaeology 209 f.</sup> [[BDB#Now|Now]]<sup>Archaeology i.232f.</sup> [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>Amos, 227f</sup>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺרָד‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ירד‎</span>. I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺרָה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָרֵא‎</span>. p 432, 434
